block.p: BORDERS GROUP INC., Ann Arbor, Mich., named Philip M. Pfeffer chief executive, succeeding Robert F. DiRomualdo, who continues as chairman. Mr. Pfeffer was president and chief operating officer of Random House, the publisher in New York, until its acquisition by Bertelsmann A.G. earlier this year.
ENTERGY CORP., New Orleans, promoted J. Wayne Leonard to chief executive from president.
QUAKER OATS CO., Chicago, named Terence D. Martin senior vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding Robert S. Thomason, who will retire at the end of this month.
